name: claude-codex-settings (fcakyon)
description: [项目级] My personal Claude Code and OpenAI Codex setup with battle-tested skills, commands, hooks, agents and MCP servers that I use daily.。来源: https://github.com/fcakyon/claude-codex-settings

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
My personal Claude Code and OpenAI Codex setup with battle-tested skills, commands, hooks, agents and MCP servers that I use daily.

来源: https://github.com/fcakyon/claude-codex-settings
语言: Python
Stars: 430

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
> **Prerequisites:** Before installing, ensure you have Claude Code and required tools installed. See [INSTALL.md](INSTALL.md) for complete prerequisites.

Install agents, commands, hooks, skills, and MCP servers via [Claude Code Plugins](https://docs.claude.com/en/docs/claude-code/plugins) system:

```bash

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
AGENTS.md
CLAUDE.md
INSTALL.md
LICENSE
README.md
context7.json
plugins
plugins/azure-tools
plugins/ccproxy-tools
plugins/claude-tools
plugins/gcloud-tools
plugins/general-dev
plugins/github-dev
plugins/linear-tools
plugins/mongodb-tools
plugins/notification-tools

plugins/plugin-dev

name: claude-codex-settings/plugins 模块
description: [模块级] claude-codex-settings 项目的 plugins 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/fcakyon/claude-codex-settings

genes.title: plugins 模块说明
genes.content:
/plugin install azure-tools@claude-settings        # Azure MCP & Skills (40+ services)
/plugin install ccproxy-tools@claude-settings      # Use any LLM via ccproxy/LiteLLM
/plugin install claude-tools@claude-settings       # Sync CLAUDE.md + allowlist
/plugin install gcloud-tools@claude-settings       # GCloud MCP & Skills
/plugin install general-dev@claude-settings        # Code simplifier + utilities
/plugin install github-dev@claude-settings         # Git workflow + GitHub MCP
/plugin install

genes.title: plugins 文件结构
genes.content:
plugins/azure-tools
plugins/azure-tools/.claude-plugin
plugins/azure-tools/.claude-plugin/plugin.json
plugins/azure-tools/.mcp.json
plugins/azure-tools/commands
plugins/azure-tools/commands/setup.md
plugins/azure-tools/skills
plugins/azure-tools/skills/azure-usage
plugins/azure-tools/skills/azure-usage/SKILL.md
plugins/azure-tools/skills/setup
plugins/azure-tools/skills/setup/SKILL.md
plugins/ccproxy-tools
plugins/ccproxy-tools/.claude-plugin
plugins/ccproxy-tools/.claude-plugin/plugin.json
plugins/ccproxy-tools/commands

genes.title: plugins 代码示例
genes.content:
After installing MCP plugins, run `/plugin-name:setup` for configuration (e.g., `/slack-tools:setup`).

Then create symlink for cross-tool compatibility:
